message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today. I think it would be incredibly useful for someone with your needs. I'm asking for $20,000 to start the negotiations.
I'm interested in the product, but $20,000 is a bit out of my budget. I'd be willing to pay $15,000 for it. Can you meet me at this price?
I appreciate your offer, Bob, but $15,000 is quite a bit lower than I'm hoping for.  Could you do $18,000? I'm confident this product will exceed your expectations and be well worth the investment.
I understand you're confident in the product's value, but I'm on a tight budget. I'd be willing to meet you halfway at $16,000. Can you consider this price?
